sub_title: VP & Associate Director, Profitable Growth Transformation Leader, driving change in Energy and Utilities companies with deep expertise in business systems, improvement processes and workforce development
summary:
As VP & Associate Director, I drive change in Energy and Utilities companies with deep expertise in business systems, improvement processes and workforce development, utilizing world- class change and business improvement methodologies. I am an experienced manager of project- and implementation teams, coaches and leadership facilitators – both internal (Philips, EON) and external (Accenture). 

Key strengths include: sustainable performance and culture change: leading teams to design and deliver large-scale business transformations and culture change programs; Organizational Health: from enterprise-wide framework creation to design & delivery of Organizational Health improvement programs; supporting C-Suite with systemic leadership analysis, shaping impactful interventions and building modern leadership capabilities; leading value enablement and realization initiatives to quickly resolve performance problems; improving organizational agility, financials and customer experience to enable organic growth. 

As a highly effective change management leader, I quickly gain universal support to enable world class delivery and position workforces to drive strategic achievements independently. I am adept at resolving complex scenarios utilising analytical thinking and ‘business sense’ to improve business agility and financials, not at the expense of people, progress and performance.

Skills:
- Strategic Growth Transformation.
- Business Systems
- Leadership development
- Change Management Delivery Programmes
- Performance / Financial Performance Drives
- World Class Change Leadership  
- Business Model Enhancement / Repositioning 
- Strategic Business Impact Assessments
- Profitable Business Improvements
- Lean, SIGMA, Agile & Digital Methodologies
- Business Agility / Performance Development 
- P&L / Cashflow Performance Delivery
